original_text: Manasseh did things that the Lord said were evil. He did the same terrible sins that the other nations in Canaan had done. Those were the nations that the Lord had chased out so that the Israelites could live there. Chronicles 32 Chronicles 34
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 여호와께서 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 쫓아내신 이방 사람들의 가증한 일을 본받아

sentences.original_text: that the Lord said were evil
He did the same terrible sins
that the other nations in Canaan had done
that the Lord had chased out
so that the Israelites could live there
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 그곳에 살 수 있도록
